paper_abstract: We demonstrate that the Cutting Plane (CP) rank, also known as the Chvatal rank, of the Pigeonhole Principle is Theta(log n). Our proof uses a novel technique which allows us to demonstrate rank lower bounds for fractional points with fewer restrictions than previous methods. We also demonstrate that the Pigeonhole Principle has a polynomially sized CP proof. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On the Chvatal rank of the Pigeonhole Principle
